name: Utopic Onomatopoeia
text: (This card is always treated as a "Zubaba", "Gagaga", "Gogogo

Dododo" card.)
During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon up to 1 each "Zubaba", "Gagaga", "Gogogo", and/or "Dododo" monster from your hand in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Utopic Onomatopoeia" once per turn.
